title: Key Components of Data Security
text: Consider the essential elements that protect data from unauthorized access and ensure its integrity.

title: Encryption
text: Encryption is a method of converting data into a code to prevent unauthorized access. It is crucial for protecting sensitive information.
choices: encryption, access controls, and regular audits

title: Access Controls
text: Access controls are mechanisms that restrict access to data based on user roles and permissions. They help ensure that only authorized users can access certain data.
choices: encryption, access controls, and regular audits

title: Regular Audits
text: Regular audits involve systematically reviewing and assessing data security measures to ensure compliance and identify potential vulnerabilities.
choices: encryption, access controls, and regular audits
